summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 19379 entitled: "An Ordinance providing for the rebating and refunding of the excess portions of all assessments levied for the improvement of the alleys in Blocks 124 and 125 of A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition by grading, etc., as provided for in Ordinance No. 14995, creating Local Improvement District No. 1347".
